Privacy Policy

Overview

This privacy policy explains how helenburgess.id.au ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and protects your information when you visit our website.

Information We Collect

Analytics

We use Google Analytics 4 to understand how visitors interact with our website. This service collects:

  • Pages visited and time spent on pages
  • Technical information such as browser type and device type
  • Approximate geographic location (country/city level)
  • Referral sources

This data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you personally. You can opt-out of analytics tracking by using the cookie consent banner or by using Google's opt-out browser add-on.

Cookies

We use essential cookies to:

  • Remember your analytics preferences
  • Improve site performance

You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings and our cookie consent banner.

Embedded Content

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g., images, videos, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves as if you visited that website directly.

These websites may:

  • Collect data about you
  • Use their own cookies
  • Monitor your interaction with the embedded content

Data Storage and Security

This is a static website, which means we don't maintain a database of user information. Any data collected through Google Analytics is stored on Google's servers according to their privacy policy.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Opt-out of analytics tracking
  • Request information about what data Google Analytics has collected about your visits
  • Request deletion of your analytics data

Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

Contact

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the contact form on our website.

Last Updated

This privacy policy was last updated on March 20, 2024.

About

Exploring the road less travelled in technology, craft, and life. Veteran, Nana, knitter, and web technologist sharing lived experiences.
